title: Paddle Pro : Android Wear
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
description: A classic paddle ball game for Android Wear devices.Now you can also play on your mobile devices.Note:Horizontal swipe to the right is default gesture in Android Wear that cannot be intercepted therefore you have to be careful while playing.
descriptionHTML:
A classic paddle ball game for Android Wear devices.
Now you can also play on your mobile devices.

Note:
Horizontal swipe to the right is default gesture in Android Wear that cannot be intercepted therefore you have to be careful while playing.
comments: Keen I only looked for something like this so I can be like commander keen during his off hours lol I love this if only it was in phosphorus green then it would get five stars
Never connected Lg g watch (without r) just never opens sicks uninstall this
Good game It's a fun game for when I'm bored I would give it 5 stars but on android wear it's too fast and I lose easily
Fun time waster. Would like it to only start once you pick up the paddle.
Great! But.. I would have given 5 stars but it would be nice to have an option in the settings to adjust for a round style watch.
It's very entertaining! It works great on my LG G watch!  Great little game to pass time.
recentChanges: -now you can play from phone as well as from the watch
